The 2018 north hemispheric concurrent heat extremes in an attribution framework. Shown are average north hemispheric concurrent hot day area thresholds (May to July) relative to the full NH AgPop area (0% to 65%) versus probabilities of exceeding that concurrent hot day area. The GCWH18 area is highlighted by a purple vertical dashed line in each subpanel.
